ALL IN ONE EDU-TECH

VMS AUTOMATION

1) Student Online Admission

a. Admit students online, generate QR code and put it on Advertising or Advertise Admission link on WhatsApp, Fcaebook, or various social media links.

b.Track every enquiry and follow-ups.

2) Student ID Card Automation

a. Capture a students photo using Teacher App, verify data and print ID cards or publish to printer.

3) RFID Attendence for Students & Staff

a. Capture and Share Students in & Out Time & School Admin

b. System captures Attendence reports.

c. Auto prepare attendence report.

4) Fee Automation

a. Parents pay fees from App and get Fee Receipts, with automatic bank UTR Number tally . No ques at the fee couter.

b. Teachers/Admin can track outstanding fee using Teacher App

5) Exam Results Automation

a. Marks slips in Teacher App , Prepare Results from Mobile Phone.

b. Share Result in various formats With Graph, Percentile, Highest Marks, Health, Remarks, Teachers Remarks etc. All using Mobile App.

6) Online Examination

a. Conduct Online MCQ Examination or detailed examination.

7) Learning Management

a. Update LMS videos & Synchronize teaching at school.

8) Timetable & Teacher Logbook Automation

a. Maintain Lecture & Topic level planning for all subjects, teachers, and sections at school /college.

9) Manage Library & Iventory

a. Issue and Manage Books. Manage Iventory items like stationery, Books, Uniform etc.

10) Mangae Expenses, Deposite, Fines & Discounts

a. Track Petty Expenses, Bills, Vouchers. Manage refundable deposits Collect fines and tracks Discounts given to students.
